an5.293:1.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ājīvako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an5.293:1.3: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, abrahmacārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
an5.293:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato ājīvako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
